description: Standard physical attack
name: Attack
note:
<setup action>

display action
if user.attackMotion() !=='missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: target, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !=='missile'
 move user: target, front, 20
else
 perform start
end

wait for movement
motion attck: user
wait:10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description:
A firey attack that hits all targets.
Any paralyzed enemies might wake up.
name: Fire

description:
A lighting based attack that has a small chance to 
paralyze the the target.
name: Spark

description: A single target ice attack.
name: Ice

description:
A thundering breath that can paralyze the even the most
stout oppponents.
name: Thundering Breath

description: Drains the enemy of their mana
name: Mana Drain

description: Removes any negative status effects off one ally.
name: Cure

description:
CHARGE!! This attack does a massive blow to the
target. It might miss though
name: Charge

Increases the chance of being the target of the

This move is guaranteed strike fear into the heart

name: Fear

name: Absorb Magic

description:

name: Blade Barrage

description:
